name: Charlie at CyberObject

commands.description: Describe flows on how to activate call forwarding
commands.title: forward calls

commands.title: Change my voicemail password

commands.title: three way call is not working

commands.title: change privacy manager PIN

commands.title: offer a new case

keywords: Q&a app for Internet, TV, Phone issues
longDescription: Charlie at CyberObject is a bot for Microsoft Teams app. When you run into Internet, TV, or Home Phone issues, Charlie at CyberObject can help. Connect to Charlie with any question from programming your remote, resetting Wifi, or how to forward your calls, and Charlie is there with a quick answer. Charlie is an easy-to-reach, easy-to-talk-to general help desk loaded with industry knowledge and designed to converse in natural language. Working in a question and answer format, Charlie is smart enough to let the user say or type almost anything, narrow down the topic and provide useful responses. Using Charlie at CyberObject saves you from that lengthy call to your carrier or phone company, and maybe even a service visit! See if Charlie can help you today. The app currently supports only US geo location.
shortDescription: Q&A app giving quick responses on U.S. based phone and Internet issues.

examplePrompts.prompt: @Charlie at CyberObject Can you help me forward calls from my office phone to my mobile?
examplePrompts.description: User wants to forward calls to their mobile phone.

examplePrompts.prompt: @Charlie at CyberObject I think my wifi is not working, can you assist?
examplePrompts.description: User is experiencing issues with their wifi connection.

examplePrompts.prompt: @Charlie at CyberObject How do I block anonymous callers on my phone line?
examplePrompts.description: User wants to block anonymous callers.
